thread.title: Chinese, Indian Leaders Seek Harmony After a Fractious Year

author: Bill Spindle
title: Chinese, Indian Leaders Seek Harmony After a Fractious Year
text:
Chinese President Xi Jinping and Indian Prime Minister Narendra Modi are scheduled to meet Friday for a discussion aimed at getting the relationship between Asia’s two rising powers back on track after a bumpy year.
The two men haven’t specified the agenda for their two-day meeting in the central Chinese city of Wuhan. But analysts expect the discussions will touch on border disputes, trade imbalances, the sensitive issue of China’s growing ties with India’s foe Pakistan and China’s expanding economic and political influence...
